tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE claims_data (
 claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_id INT,
 claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
 claim_date DATE,
 claim_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE claims_data (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_date DATE,
    claimant_name VARCHAR(50),
    claimed_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT REFERENCES claims_data(claim_id),
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
    note_date TIMESTAMP,
    note_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
	claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	claim_date DATE,
	claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	policy_number VARCHAR(20),
	claim_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE claims_data (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE policy_information (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policyholder_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    policy_start_date DATE,
    policy_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE claim_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    is_validated BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE suspicious_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_id INT,
    report_date DATE
)
